mapper.select: SELECT A.CCODE, A.CONTENT, A.WRITERID, TO_CHAR(A.POSTDATE,'RRRR-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') POSTDATE, A.LEV, A.UPPER, A.BCODE, A.ISDELETE,B.* FROM COMMENTS A JOIN COMMENTSPOINT B ON A.CCODE=B.CCODE WHERE A.BCODE=#{bcode} START WITH A.UPPER IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR A.CCODE=A.UPPER

SELECT A.CCODE, A.CONTENT, A.WRITERID, TO_CHAR(A.POSTDATE,'RRRR-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') POSTDATE, A.LEV, A.UPPER, A.BCODE, A.ISDELETE,B.* FROM COMMENTS A JOIN COMMENTSPOINT B ON A.CCODE=B.CCODE WHERE A.CCODE=#{ccode}
